item.title: Taiwan Championship 2022
item.author: Ricky Hu
item.description: It has been a long time since I posted for a competition, But I kind of want to document my life down, therefore I wrote this post just after the comp lol Before the competition In fact, I was struggling pretty much the week before the competition. There are many tasks that have a very early deadline for my internship and university, and I had a stomachache for several days.

item.title: Welcome
item.author: Ricky Hu
item.description: Welcome to my blog! This is just a post that makes my blog feel like there is something here.
